CustomField.formula: IF ( Duration__c > 0, TEXT(FLOOR( Duration__c)) & " days " & TEXT( FLOOR( 24 * ( Duration__c - FLOOR( Duration__c) ))) & " hours" & TEXT( ROUND(60 * (ROUND( 24 * ( Duration__c - FLOOR( Duration__c ) ),8) - FLOOR( ROUND( 24 * ( Duration__c - FLOOR(Duration__c ) ),8)) ),0)) & " mn " , "")
CustomField.label: Duration 2
